thread.title: EXCLUSIVE: 'The Hills' Star Jason Wahler Expecting First Child With Wife Ashley!
thread.title_full: EXCLUSIVE: 'The Hills' Star Jason Wahler Expecting First Child With Wife Ashley!

author: Alex Ungerman
title: EXCLUSIVE: 'The Hills' Star Jason Wahler Expecting First Child With Wife Ashley!
text: EXCLUSIVE: 'The Hills' Star Jason Wahler Expecting First Child With Wife Ashley! by Alex Ungerman   More baby news from The Hills alums! Jason Wahler and his wife, Ashley, are expecting their first child together, the couple revealed to ET exclusively. "We are so overjoyed and excited for this baby!" the couple tells ET. "We absolutely LOVE kids and are so happy to finally be starting a family of our own." WATCH: Lauren Conrad Pregnant With First Child Wahler tells us heâ€™s looking forward to witnessing the newborn "have their first words or walk for the first time. All of it is such an incredible journey and blessing we get to be a part of." And while they know the sex of their baby, Ashley and Jason have opted not to share it just yet. They'll be hosting a small gathering for close family and friends in March to reveal the gender. The two have been married since October 2013, and are expecting their bundle of joy in August. Congratulations to the happy couple! Meanwhile, it's baby bump city over in Hills -land right now. Watch the video below to see Lauren Conrad show off her burgeoning belly. Reporting by Brendon Geoffrion .
